title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 226-1.7 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 226-1.7 - Exemptions

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
shall not apply to: (1)
conveyorized
degreasers with an air/vapor interface smaller than 22 square feet (2.0
m
2
); (2)
open top vapor degreasers with an open top area smaller than 11 square feet
(1.0 m
2
); (3)
conveyorized and open top vapor
degreasers subject to the requirements in 40 CFR
63, Subpart T; and

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
226-1.7

Adopted

New

York State Register October 23, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 43, eff. 11/1/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
